title: Control of electrical installation
fullText:
The supply to the electrical installation in a recreational vehicle or non-recreational vehicle shall be controlled on the main switchboard by a main switch or switches that control the whole of the electrical installation.
The control of the electrical installation may be provided by the current limiting protection device required by Clause 4.5.3. A combined RCD and overcurrent circuit-breaker (RCBO) complying with the requirements of AS/NZS 61009 may be used to satisfy this requirement.
